name: Bunny Business (RennJan)
description:
A multiplayer bunny farming game

Fill the space with bunnies as fast as you can!

Get 100s of bunnies in under 10 minutes

To get more bunnies you will need to occupy more space with pens! 

Rare bunny combinations provide more income for your bunny business!

ControlResultWASDMovementNum KeysChange EquipmentLeft Mouse Use EquipmentFPickup and PutdownHammer Build MenuMouse Click on Icons

We really liked what we came up with for the theme, and want to make a run of this as an actual game with inspiration from Stardew Valley, Garden Story, Valheim, Animal Crossing, graveyard keeper, slime rancher.

We will post updates with features that we removed like farming and feeding, more building and structures for nventory crafting and storage.

Enjoy ~~
